descripcion:
This listening program is intended for intermediate and advanced Spanish level. It deals with the experiences of a student while traveling in Spain doing el Camino de Santiago. Vocabulary selections and grammar tenses are appropriate of intermediate and advanced Spanish textbooks. Very effective for new Spanish learners as well as for heritage learners that are familiar with words but don't know how to write Spanish. The book provides listeners an enjoyable option to practice the language while learning about the adventures of a student who wins a trip to Spain. This is the third book of the series ¡Buen Camino! A Spanish Language Learning Adventure. Please note that the book does not have the last chapter. It is intended for Spanish language students to write an essay and participate in a competition where the final chapter will be selected and published. 
Please note: This audiobook is in Spanish.
